name: UIView.AnimationTransition
desc: Animation transition options for use in an animation block object.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The option for indicating that no transition is specified.

items.name: case flipFromLeft
items.desc: A transition that flips a view around a vertical axis from left to right. The left side of the view moves towards the front and right side towards the back.

items.name: case flipFromRight
items.desc: A transition that flips a view around a vertical axis from right to left. The right side of the view moves towards the front and left side towards the back.

items.name: case curlUp
items.desc: A transition that curls a view up from the bottom.

items.name: case curlDown
items.desc: A transition that curls a view down from the top.
